name: Home
story: Hello there... Hello and welcome to the world tour. This tour will take us to some magical towns around the world. It's a treasure investigation. You win the game by locating the city where the treasure is hidden. Choosing certain risky cities can also result in the game ending unexpectedly. Make a rational decision. Let us begin this wonderful venture. *******EATING, SLEEPING, BREATHING, AND TRAVELING*****
navigation: Press 1 to go to  Brasov and press 2 to go to  Vianden

name: Brasov
story: Welcome to Brasov, the town of fairytale. A pastel-colored Old Town Centre with lovely houses and small alleyways can be found here. There's a distinct beauty to this location, which is accentuated by the surrounding mountains. There are two magnificent castles waiting to be visited.
navigation: Press 1 to go to Trebon and press 2 to go to Ludwigsburg

name: Vianden
story: Hello and welcome to Vianden. Winding cobblestone streets lead up a hill to the magnificent Vianden Castle, which overlooks the valley and River. You can get a nice cup of coffee at one of the cafes along the canal, and there is a wonderful place to relax.
navigation: Press 1 to go to Castle district of Budapest  and press 2 to go to Starting point

name: Trebon
story: Oh no! You've picked the risky city. You've missed the points, and the game is over.

name: Ludwigsburg
story: Hello and welcome to Ludwigsburg. A splendid baroque castle can be found here. There is a captivating "Fairytale Greenhouse," a ceramics gallery, a classical private theatre with intact stage equipment, and meticulous formal gardens here.
navigation: Press 1 to go to Dingle and press 2 to go to Starting point

name: Castle district of Budapest
story: Helloooo.... Wherever you look, there is a stunning architectural structure. Simply put, this is Budapest, an impressive city filled with some of the most stunning architecture.
navigation: Press 1 to go to Stockholm and press 2 to go to Trebon

name: Dingle
story: Congratulations, you've selected the treasure mining towns, and you've won the game... Have fun...

name: Stockholm
story: Hello and welcome to Stockholm. This is a fantastic place. A lovely garden can be found here. You can make lovely flower bouquets and sell them for a price.
navigation: Press 1 to go to Noyers sur Serein and press 2 to go to Startingpoint

name: Noyers sur Serein
story: Hello and welcome to Noyers-sur-Serein. This is a charming mediaeval village located on the banks of the River. It is a lovely village.
navigation: Press 1 to go to Siurana and press 2 to go to  Alberobello

name: Siurana
story: Hello and welcome to Siurana. This is a pilgrimage destination for climbers from around the country, as well as a lovely weekend getaway.
navigation: Press 1 to go to Azenhas do Mar and press 2 to go to  Startingpoint

name: Azenhas do Mar
story: Helloooooo.... Beautiful beaches can be found here, as well as a handsome little village that is a super cool destination, but its short, cobblestoned alleyways, whitewashed homes, and sea views make it a beautiful destination any time of year.
navigation: Press 1 to go to Stein Am Rhein and press 2 to go to  Los Cabos

name: Stein Am Rhein
story: Welcome to Stein am Rhein, a charming mediaeval town. Your delectable food is ready; please enjoy it and replenish your energy to continue the trip.
navigation: Press 1 to go to Monsanto and press 2 to go to  Startingpoint

name: Monsanto
story: Hello and welcome to Monsanto, a mediaeval village. Monsanto has a magical look, like something out of a fairy tale, and you can see the town's giant boulders from here.
navigation: Press 1 to go to Gruyeres and press 2 to go to  Dingle

name: Gruyeres
story: Welcome to Gruyeres, a beautiful old town in the mountains. Since there isn't anything to do nearby, it's a simple day trip. Get fun....
navigation: Press 1 to go to Montcontour and press 2 to go to  Startingpoint

name: Montcontour
story: Hello and welcome to Moncontour. This is a beautiful village that has retained its mediaeval charm.
navigation: Press 1 to go to Geithoorn and press 2 to go to  Startingpoint

name: Giethoorn
story: Helloooooo... This location is really unique... Since there are virtually no roads, the village has a quiet and friendly feeling that is almost unheard of in today's urban world. One thing is that you have a guide to help you here.
navigation: Press 1 to go to Portree on the Isle of sky and press 2 to go to Starting point

name: Portree on the Isle of Sky
story: Hello and welcome to the Isle of Skye. This is an enchanted and beautiful island. The wonders that await you here include mediaeval towns, crashing waterfalls, glistening streams, stunning beaches, enchanting castles, and dramatic rugged scenery.
navigation: Press 1 to go to Lichtenstein and press 2 to go to Alberobello

name: Lichtenstein
story: Helloooooo... Here you can see gothic ruins, aerial and scenic mountainsï¿½a wonderful place to visit.
navigation: Press 1 to go to Los Cabos and press 2 to go to  Startingpoint

name: Alberobello
story: Congratulations, you've selected the treasure mining towns, and you've won the game... Have fun...

name: Los Cabos
story: Oh no! You've picked the world's most dangerous city. You've missed the points, and the game is over.
